column1: Local Foods////1. Service - Not much for service as this is somewhat a self serve restaurant. The concept is that you order and pay for it up front
column5: and they bring you your plate. They come to check up on you afterwards. If you need a refill
column6: do it yourself. If you need more food
column7: go up and order some more. Nevertheless
column8: the cashier up front is friendly. It's a fast pace concept
